metadata.title: Mountain Goat Survey Data - CNF
metadata.description: Data Type: Mammals;   This data set contains aerial survey data collected between August and October 1994 in goat habitat area, between 1000-300 ft. elevation. Observations of Mountain goats were noted on USGS 1:250,000 scale maps. The numbers of adults and kids were recorded.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Monitor population numbers and composition of mountain goats as indicator species of diversity and habitat health.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Unknown
